title: Intentional Learning Design Utilizing Computer-Mediated Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning tools and secondary-level science education experience
context.additional_context: A course for training science education specialists among working professionals, operated around non-real-time online interactions in environments where digital devices are provided

learning_goals: Learners can analyze changes in teacher beliefs by applying qualitative research methodologies in computer-mediated interaction environments
Learners can design digital learning modules for science education using the Intentional Learning Design (TIL) framework
Learners can operate peer feedback systems using online discussion forums and multi-log-based communication tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
